docs.snippet: Get recommendations from New York Times reporters and editors, highlighting great stories from around the web. Today, great reads from Jim Dwyer, Diaa Hadid and others....
docs.abstract: Get recommendations from New York Times reporters and editors, highlighting great stories from around the web. Today, great reads from Jim Dwyer, Diaa Hadid and others.

docs.snippet: Croatian Prime Minister Tihomir Oreskovic urged his two deputies on Friday to resign over a political dispute in which they are both embroiled so that the government can press ahead with crucial economic reforms, but they rejected his call....
docs.lead_paragraph: Croatian Prime Minister Tihomir Oreskovic urged his two deputies on Friday to resign over a political dispute in which they are both embroiled so that the government can press ahead with crucial economic reforms, but they rejected his call.

headline.main: Two Deputies to Croatian PM Reject His Call to Resign
headline.print_headline: Two Deputies to Croatian PM Reject His Call to Resign

docs.snippet: Ukrainian Prime Minister Volodymyr Groysman said on Friday he would not let his decision-making be shackled by powerful vested interests, allowing him to push through reforms and usher in a period of economic stability....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ukrainian Prime Minister Volodymyr Groysman said on Friday he would not let his decision-making be shackled by powerful vested interests, allowing him to push through reforms and usher in a period of economic stability.

headline.main: I Am My Own Man, Says Ukraine's New Prime Minister
headline.print_headline: I Am My Own Man, Says Ukraine's New Prime Minister

docs.snippet: A two-state solution to the Israeli-Palestinian conflict may soon be impossible, France said on Friday as it held an international conference to revive the quest for a deal despite Israel's warning that the effort is doomed to failure....
docs.lead_paragraph: A two-state solution to the Israeli-Palestinian conflict may soon be impossible, France said on Friday as it held an international conference to revive the quest for a deal despite Israel's warning that the effort is doomed to failure.

headline.main: Chance of Two-State Solution Fading, France Says in Reviving Israeli-Palestinian Peace Push
headline.print_headline: Chance of Two-State Solution Fading, France Says in Reviving Israeli-Palestinian Peace Push

docs.snippet: Presumptive Republican U.S. presidential nominee Donald Trump on Friday denounced protesters in California as "thugs" a day after another demonstration outside one of his political rallies turned violent ahead of the state's presidential primary....
docs.lead_paragraph: Presumptive Republican U.S. presidential nominee Donald Trump on Friday denounced protesters in California as "thugs" a day after another demonstration outside one of his political rallies turned violent ahead of the state's presidential primary.

headline.main: Trump Campaigns in California, Denounces Protesters at Rally as 'Thugs'
headline.print_headline: Trump Campaigns in California, Denounces Protesters at Rally as 'Thugs'
